item.title: ‘Captain America: Civil War’ was released 7 years ago today.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness’ was released one year ago today.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: The barrier-breaking album spent 13 weeks at #1 on the Billboard 200 and broke several records. It became the first album by a Latin artist to reach 10 BILLION Spotify streams and made history as the first Spanish-language album to earn a Grammy nomination for Album of the Year.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: One year ago today, Bad Bunny released ‘Un Verano Sin Ti.’
item.author: PopBase

item.title: The second single off ‘Dangerous Woman’ peaked at #13 on the Billboard Hot 100 and is certified 4x Platinum in the US. It was named the sixth best pop song of 2016 by Billboard and has over 1 billion streams on Spotify.
item.author: PopBase
